channel.title: Running Server Help
channel.description:
[center]Hello Everyone
Iv Download Alot Of Server/Clients To See If Its That Or My Computer, And Its My Computer I Guess,
Well The Problem Is When I Run My Server It Just Pops Up And Then Goes Right Away I Have Downloaded The Newest Java JDK And It Still Does The Same Problem I Just Dont Understand Why? Please Help Me
Thanks From
- Joshua1289 -[/center]

item.title: Running Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Joshua1289 Joshua1289
item.description:
@Joshua1289 wrote:

[center]I Just Dont Understand Why It Isnt Working, Iv Done Everything To Try Make It Work…
Some On Please Help Me Find A Awsome Tutorial Please.

Thanks From

  • Joshua1289 -[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Running Server Help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

the code in your run.bat is incorrect, replace it with this:

@echo off title UsmanIsEpic set java="C:Program FilesJavajdk1.6.0_20binjava.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

you need jdk 20 to make this work. change the “20” in line 3 to ur jdk version.

Read full topic

item.title: Running Server Help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Set your environmental variables, and make sure the path inside the batch file is correct.

Read full topic
